interface.name: MotorCommand
interface.comment: Port to return the necssary data from the motors

arg.name: command_type
arg.comment: Selector for which command should be called

arg.name: Motor_ID
arg.comment: The motor id from 0 - 4 (Motor 0 is Front Left motor and goes counter clockwise) 4 is all motors

arg.name: Configuration_Selection
arg.comment: This is relevant only for MC_DrivingConfiguration command

arg.name: Parameter_Selection
arg.comment: This will vary depending on which command type is chosen
